inclusion.criterion: Male and female infants born preterm at ≤30 weeks + 6 days post menstrual age
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Anticipated last dose of routine caffeine will be by 36 weeks + 5 days
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: At least 12 hours of breathing room air with no ventilatory support other than on room air nasal air flow therapy regardless of flow rate, or on room air and receiving nasal CPAP, and relapse not anticipated.
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: It is feasible to administer the first dose of study drug no later than 36 weeks + 6 days PMA
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Intraventricular hemorrhage Grade III-IV or cystic periventricular leukomalacia
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior treatment for seizures
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current or prior treatment for cardiac arrhythmias
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Known renal or hepatic dysfunction that in the opinion of the investigator would have a clinically relevant impact on caffeine metabolism
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Major malformation, inborn error of metabolism, chromosomal abnormality
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Presence of a condition for which survival to discharge unlikely
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has multiple comorbidities including COPD, OSA, obesity hypoventilation syndrome, dCHF. Daughter reports increased agitation and altered mental status x 2-3 days with O2 sats 60s-70s at home.
